item.title: Why I like SCRUM - Tips which may help you
item.description: Hi, in this post I want to tell youÂ why I like SCRUM - Tips which may help you After I started to be interested in agile management processes, SCRUM took nearly all of my attention and I often hear that people do not understand it or do not know how to get along with it. If your company wants to work with SCRUM you should get an idea of it and learn it.
